item.title: Target’s CEO is betting billions that Gen Zers will get off their phones and fuel a comeback
item.description: Target will invest billions in stores to fuel a comeback amid declining sales.

item.title: Trump’s DOJ admits it didn’t show the full Comey indictment to the grand jury that charged him with 2 crimes

item.title: ‘Saying this is the most important stock in the world is an understatement’: Market holds its breath as Nvidia offers AI progress report

item.title: Wisconsin archaeologists unearth a prehistoric lake ‘parking lot’ by mapping the location of 16 ancient canoes
item.description: It shows how long the Ho-Chunk tribe has lived in the region "and how deeply connected we remain to these waters and lands,” said Bill Quackenbush.

item.title: Gustav Klimt portrait that played life-saving role in Holocaust sets modern art record of $236 million at auction
item.description: "Portrait of Elisabeth Lederer" was considered "too Jewish" to be worth stealing by the Nazis, but it played a role in saving its subject's life.
